titles.title: Fair and Cost Effective Federal Travel Act of 2009

To prohibit any department or agency of the Federal Government from establishing a travel or conference policy that takes into account the perception of a location as a resort or vacation destination in determining the location for an event.
Fair and Cost Effective Federal Travel Act of 2009
